element.name: Centaur-Born
element.description:
The noble centaurs, part humanoid and part horse, roamed the lands of Meir in ages past. A centaur-born inherits the speed and strength of these glorious ancestors.

CENTAUR-BORN TRAITS

Your centaur-born character has the following racial traits.

Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 2. Choose a subrace to determine which ability (Dexterity or Constitution) increases by 1.

Alignment. Centaur-born may or may not be good, but they have a strong tendency toward neutral alignments.

Centaur's Speed. Your base walking speed is 40 feet.

Centaur's Strength. You are proficient in Athletics.

Charge. If you move at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hit it with a melee attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier) or be knocked prone. If the target is knocked prone, you can make another melee attack against the target as a bonus action.

Languages. You can speak, read, and write two languages of your choice.

element.name: Centaur-Born Subrace
element.description: Choose one Centaur-Born subrace. This determines which secondary ability increases by 1.

element.name: Centaur-Born (Dexterity)
element.description:
As a Dexterity-focused centaur-born, your quick reflexes and agility reflect your heritage.

Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increases by 1.

element.name: Centaur-Born (Constitution)
element.description:
As a Constitution-focused centaur-born, your endurance and durability reflect your heritage.

Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increases by 1.
